title: News: Coachella 2012 Line-up Revealed
content:
Taking place over two weekends in April (April 13-15 & 20-22 respectively), the world renowned Coachella Valley Music and Arts festival is set for it’s biggest year yet.

With a duplicate bill for the first year ever, the event is expected to attract in excess of 300,000 people across it’s six day period. Earlier this evening they announced, via their twitter page, the first set of acts due to feature at Coachella 2012. Including the likes of Radiohead, The Black Keys, Bon Iver and Dr. Dre & Snoop Dogg, as well as the newly reformed At The Drive-In, it’s quite rightly being regarded as the most expensive festival line-up in the world, if not in history. Check out the full list of acts set to play on the poster below.

Ticket information is available via the official Coachella website.
